synopsis: An unknown creature GON appears in the forest.
GON gets hold of the forest. All GON is interested in is to eat, play and sleep.
GON struggles to get rid of a tick that went into its nose.
Reed, the ruler of Savanna, becomes a new ride for GON.
GON plays with a young elephant who drops out from its herd.
GON trains Speed King, the fastest bird who hurt its foot.
GON tries everything to become as beautiful as peacocks.
Nobody takes food from GON, not even the clever little thief in the forest, Choro!
Gangs in the forest calls Wild Boars to get rid of GON.
GON helps the big friend to find its even bigger mother.
A wanderer appears in Savanna and tries to get GON off from Reed.
GON and friends get swept away by a whirlwind into a desert.
GON helps Ollie to find its stolen baby eggs.
GON faces the mysterious desert monster, Scorpion King.

title.jp: Gon, Discovering the Taste of Honey / Gon, Confronting Don the Wild Boar

synopsis: GON trains its new apprentice Tackle King, to become even stronger.
GON is having fun watching Mhu, the parrot, imitating everyone.
Leon returns to the forest to challenge the strongest, but GON isn't just interested.

title.jp: Yan, Becoming New Leader of the Herd

synopsis: GON and friends help a baby seal to find a way back to its home, the ocean.
Gangs in the forest calls Wild Boars to get rid of GON.
Nobody takes food from GON, not even the clever little thief in the forest, Choro!
GON meets a new animal with a mysterious power in the cave.
GON travels under the sea with a baby turtle and faces new friends.

title.jp: Gon's Greatest Crisis - the Beginning / Gon's Greatest Crisis - the Aftermath

synopsis: GON and Puro challenge the King of stink bomb, Kungka.

title.jp: Gon, Surrounded by Wild Boar's Children / Gon, Eager to Fly

synopsis: GON challenges Hippo family, who has a huge appetite.

title.jp: Gon, Encounter with Young Seals / Animals of the Forest Unite

synopsis: GON's passion to eat, sleep and play somehow helps baby penguins.

title.jp: Gon, Non-stop Hiccups / Gon, Trying to Catch Shooting Stars

synopsis: GON and friends help a baby seal to find a way back to its home, the ocean.

title.jp: Gon, Becoming a Sculptor / Gon, The Wolves and Fish-Catching

synopsis: Volder, a leader of Wild Boars, comes to the forest only to find nonstop crying Kumarin.

title.jp: Penny's Close Call / Gon, Encounter with Goat

synopsis: Realizing that the fruit grows from a seed, GON looks after a little sprout day and night.

title.jp: Runaway Leader / Head's Wildboar Family VS Animals of the Forest Once Again

synopsis: GON meets a Uru-look-alike friend, a white bear.

title.jp: Encounter with legendary flame? / King of the legend? Come upon

synopsis: Weak animals from Savanna and the forest unite against GON.
GON joins the penguin family and stand up for them against a bullying seagull.

title.jp: Gon, Babysitting Penguin / Gon, Becoming a Member of Jack's Wolfpack!?

synopsis: GON and friends find the mysterious mushroom. Watch out for what you eat!

title.jp: Kai's Problem / Gon, Trying to Grow Taller

synopsis: GON gets annoyed by a couple of two troublemakers, Ura and Bo.

title.jp: Gon, Helping Ollie's Family / Another Challenge From Leon
Gon, Learning How To Dance / The Lying Fox
Gon, Wanting to Ride the Rainbow / Ussu Goes on Diet
Ussu's Love Story / Sword's Hidden Talent
The Lying Fox, Once Again / The Revival of Metakei and Leader
Love Cupid Gon / Koo's Revenge Plan
Gaizel the Coward / Bat, Can't Differentiate His Own Home
Gon, Loses to Elder Squirrel?! / Gon, Joins and Plays with Pelly the Pelican

synopsis: GON takes the exhausted Savanna animals to the snow fields.
